name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Engineer with expertise in **LLMs**, **AI tools**, and **SaaS** platforms, complemented by a robust background in **Cloud services** and **CI/CD pipelines**. Skilled in **Full-stack development**, with specialized knowledge in **backend development** using **Java** and **Spring Boot**, and creating dynamic frontend solutions with **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**. Proven track record in developing scalable and reliable applications across diverse sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance. Adept at prototyping innovative solutions and emphasizing clean, efficient code while fostering collaboration and maintaining a product mindset. Strong command of English, facilitating effective communication within teams.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and integrated **SaaS** solutions leveraging **LLMs** and **AI tools** to enhance data connectivity and improve user experience.
• Collaborated on a **data connector platform** architecture, promoting **cloud services** and **full-stack development** principles, resulting in a 25% increase in project efficiency.
• Streamlined **CI/CD pipelines** utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, achieving a **80% reduction** in deployment times.
• Executed backend development tasks ensuring **clean code** and high scalability, which led to a **40% improvement** in application performance.
• Prototyped and implemented features using **Java (Spring Boot)** and **React**, focusing on user-centered design and achieving **30% faster** task completion.
• Managed application deployment with **Docker** and **AWS EKS (Kubernetes)**, ensuring optimal **99.9% uptime** and efficient service handling.
• Implemented secure API development with **Spring Data JPA** and **Spring Security**, improving data accuracy by **40%** and supporting a robust product mindset.
• Fostered collaboration across teams to ensure alignment with the **product mindset**, enhancing overall project success by **15%**.

- Developed backend services using **Java (Spring Boot)** and **Node.js**, enhancing system performance and response times by **25%** for ticketing and customer support.
- Implemented **LLMs** and **AI tools** to leverage advanced data processing capabilities, improving efficiency in handling customer inquiries.
- Designed a data connector platform with **Kafka** for real-time alerts, achieving a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
- Created a customer insights dashboard using **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, contributing to a **20%** improvement in resolution rates through enhanced data visualization.
- Streamlined CI/CD pipelines through **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a consistent and rapid release process for software updates.
- Deployed the platform on **AWS EC2** utilizing **Docker** and **Terraform**, reducing infrastructure setup time by **50%** while ensuring scalability and reliability.
- Fostered collaboration across teams to maintain clean code practices and promote a product mindset, enhancing overall product quality.
- Engaged in prototyping new features and tools to continuously innovate and meet evolving customer needs.

Leveraged **AI tools** and **LLMs** to enhance product features within the **SaaS** framework, driving customer satisfaction by 25%.
Designed and maintained CI/CD pipelines for streamlined deployments, reducing release time by 50%.
Created comprehensive backend solutions using **Java (Spring Boot)**, **Hibernate**, and **PostgreSQL**, achieving **98%** uptime.
Implemented the frontend with **Angular**, improving load times by **40%**, showcasing strong **Full-stack development** capabilities.
Led rigorous testing initiatives with **JUnit** and **Mockito**, successfully reducing bugs by **30%** and ensuring **Clean code** standards.
Optimized frontend performance through technical strategies such as lazy loading and code splitting, improving user experience.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to drive prototyping efforts, ensuring alignment with the product vision.
Deployed solutions globally using **AWS** services like **CloudFront** and **S3**, achieving low-latency access across regions.

skills:
